title: Riot play with me for 1000th win?
body: I remember that Riot Employees used to play with people for their thousandth win. I currently have 999 wins and was wondering if any Rioters wanted to play with me for my 1000th win. :D

replies.body: Sure, let's figure out a time to play!

> this dosnt happen anymore

Sure it does! :D
sorry I didn't no I thought riot stopped doing it ages ago lol and Katey has riot found any idea what might be causing the disconnect crash thingy or are you not informed on that stuff?
